name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AWS Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in **AWS**, **CI/CD**, **Terraform**, **AWS CDK**, and automation tools like **Jenkins** and **Bitbucket**. Proficient in writing robust infrastructure as code solutions and implementing continuous integration and delivery pipelines. My technical skills also encompass cloud services, advanced scripting in **Python**, **Groovy**, and **Bash**, coupled with best practices in software testing frameworks such as **Selenium**, **XRAY**, and **Gherkin**, with an orientation towards Behavior Driven Development (BDD).

I have successfully led initiatives integrating **Snyk** for security scanning and **Sentry** for monitoring, while leveraging **SumoLogic** for log management and analytics. My foundation in microservices architecture aids in building scalable applications that meet stringent compliance standards. Additionally, I bring a strong capability in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows, enriched by hands-on experience with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
